verbose_text: Notably, this study demonstrated that NAC pretreatment attenuated H 2 O 2 -induced oxidation of Trx1 and Prx1, and decreased phosphorylation of ASK1, which may subsequently result in a reduction in caspase-3, -8 and -9 activities.
evidence: NAC pretreatment attenuated H 2 O 2 -induced oxidation of Trx1 and Prx1, and decreased phosphorylation of ASK1
